definition.name: Setup FFmpeg
definition.description: Download, cache and add to PATH ffmpeg and ffprobe binaries.
definition.author: Federico Carboni

inputs.name: ffmpeg-version
inputs.description: Version of ffmpeg to use. Version Spec is only fully supported on Windows.

inputs.name: architecture
inputs.description: Target architecture for FFmpeg, on Windows and MacOS only x64 is supported; on Linux arm64 may also be used. Defaults to the system architecture.

inputs.name: linking-type
inputs.description: Linking type of the binaries. Use "shared" to download shared binaries and "static" for statically linked ones. Shared builds are currently only available for windows releases. Defaults to "static"

inputs.name: github-token
inputs.description: Used to pull Windows builds from GyanD/codexffmpeg. Since there's a default, this is typically not supplied by the user.

outputs.name: cache-hit
outputs.description: A boolean value to indicate whether the tool cache was hit
